body: Bloggings by Boz argues that "the intense US and global media focus on Mexico's violence risks missing the 'more dangerous than Mexico' countries." He shares statistics that show that Honduras, Venezuela, Guatemala, El Salvador, Colombia and Jamaica have higher homicide rates than Mexico.
original_body: Bloggings by Boz argues that "the intense US and global media focus on Mexico's violence risks missing the 'more dangerous than Mexico' countries." He shares statistics that show that Honduras, Venezuela, Guatemala, El Salvador, Colombia and Jamaica have higher homicide rates than Mexico.
title: Latin America: Homicide Rates Show Several Countries "More Dangerous than Mexico"
